name: Egression
description:
This is the second level of the SC1 Zerg campaign. Because there is no chrysalis pickup, you have an aberration who holds it instead. If the aberration dies, you lose. Be careful while escorting it to the beacon. You also have six Hunter-Killers!

![null](<http://static.sc2mapster.com/content/images/30/951/Untitled.jpg>)
author: _ForgeUser4468584
